title: No Such Thing as a ‘Nonessential’ Worker | Guest: Candace Owens | 4/2/20
description:
Over 10 million Americans have lost their jobs in just two weeks. There is no such thing as a “nonessential” worker in America. Joe Biden offered to call President Trump about coronavirus, and Trump said he’d love to talk! Trump acts as Mexico starts to see cases and the cartels ramp up drug smuggling. BLEXIT founder Candace Owens explains why she called out the governor of Connecticut for announcing a newborn death “related” to COVID-19. And she’s finally considering running for office! In today’s coronavirus update, it’s been confirmed: China is LYING, and the WHO appears to have helped it. 95-year-old WWII vet Bill Kelly calls in after winning his battle against COVID-19! Glenn warns “Tiger King” viewers: Wait until the end! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
